Control* Otter::View::GetControlInAnimation ( uint32  animInstanceID,
const char *  szControlName 
)

If animInstanceID is non-zero, this function will search only against controls within a specific active animation

uint32 Otter::View::PlayAnimation ( const char *  szName,
uint32  startFrame = 0,
uint32  endFrame = 0,
bool  bReverse = false,
VectorMath::Matrix4  transform = VectorMath::Matrix4::IDENTITY,
bool  bMakeInstance = false 
)

If endFrame is not 0xFFFFFFFF the animation will play until it reaches the endFrame, otherwise it will continue to its logical end.

If startFrame is 0, it will start at the first frame if bReverse is false, otherwise it will start at the last frame.

If endFrame is not 0, it must be larger than or equal to startFrame if bReverse if false, otherwise it must be less than or equal to startFrame.
